articles.title: US warns of ‘disaster’ amid oil slick in Red Sea from ship hit by Houthis - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: US military says Iran-aligned group is being reckless with attacks on shipping in the Red Sea off Yemen’s shores.
articles.content:
The United States military has warned of an environmental disaster after an attack by Yemens Houthi rebels on a cargo ship caused an oil slick in the Red Sea.
The Iran-aligned group hit the United K… [+3381 chars]
